title: Remodeling Fun
clues: Paul and his wife decided that their kitchen needed a serious remodel. Jack, who lived in Dallas, wasn't married to Sasha. Franks last name wasn't Johnson.
The couple who decided the Den would be the best place to begin lived in Detroit.
Peter, who's last name wasn't Engle, was married to Jenny
The Jackson couple lived in San Jose, but they did not remodel their dining room.
Paul and Claudia were not one of the couples. Stephany Smith did not have her Den remodeled.
The Engles had their bathroom remodeled, but they didn't own a house in Tampa.
